name: Apache Camel
summary: Camel empowers you to define routing and mediation rules in a variety of domain-specific languages, including a Java-based Fluent API, Spring or Blueprint XML Configuration files, and a Scala DSL. This means you get smart completion of routing rules in your IDE, whether in a Java, Scala or XML editor. Apache Camel uses URIs to work directly with any kind of Transport or messaging model such as HTT
details: Camel empowers you to define routing and mediation rules in a variety of domain-specific languages, including a Java-based Fluent API, Spring or Blueprint XML Configuration files, and a Scala DSL. This means you get smart completion of routing rules in your IDE, whether in a Java, Scala or XML editor. Apache Camel uses URIs to work directly with any kind of Transport or messaging model such as HTTP, ActiveMQ, JMS, JBI, SCA, MINA or CXF, as well as pluggable Components and Data Format options. Apache Camel is a small library with minimal dependencies for easy embedding in any Java application. Apache Camel lets you work with the same API regardless which kind of Transport is used - so learn the API once and you can interact with all the Components provided out-of-box. Apache Camel provides support for Bean Binding and seamless integration with popular frameworks such as Spring, Blueprint and Guice. Camel also has extensive support for unit testing your routes.

name: AutomateIt
summary: AutomateIt is an open source tool for automating the setup and maintenance of servers, applications and their dependencies, providing a way to manage files, packages, services, networks, accounts, roles, templates and more.u0026nbsp;
details: AutomateIt is an open source tool for automating the setup and maintenance of servers, applications and their dependencies, providing a way to manage files, packages, services, networks, accounts, roles, templates and more.u0026nbsp;

name: bipio
summary: Bipio is an API for pipelining content feeds across many popular web services and exposing them through public or private endpoints. This documentation addresses some key concepts in getting you on your way to creating meaningful content transformations with Bipio, including how to plug its components into your own application.u0026nbsp;
details: Bipio is an API for pipelining content feeds across many popular web services and exposing them through public or private endpoints. This documentation addresses some key concepts in getting you on your way to creating meaningful content transformations with Bipio, including how to plug its components into your own application.u0026nbsp;

name: Built.io
summary: built.io is a mobile backend and application development platform. By powering the entire backend (servers, cloud infrastructure, database, scaling), and delivering built-in core app functionality, built.io lets developers build apps in record time, and focus their talent on an awesome user experience. Built from the ground up to support the growing enterprise mobility market, built.io is first to
details: built.io is a mobile backend and application development platform. By powering the entire backend (servers, cloud infrastructure, database, scaling), and delivering built-in core app functionality, built.io lets developers build apps in record time, and focus their talent on an awesome user experience. Built from the ground up to support the growing enterprise mobility market, built.io is first to release business user tools, a unique feature set among mobile application development platforms.

name: CloudWork
summary: Cloudwork is a service that allows users to automate tasks between Google Apps, Salesforce, Evernote, Zoho, Twitter, Freshbooks, MailChimp, Zendesk, Dropbox, WordPress and others.
details: Cloudwork is a service that allows users to automate tasks between Google Apps, Salesforce, Evernote, Zoho, Twitter, Freshbooks, MailChimp, Zendesk, Dropbox, WordPress and others.

name: CloverETL
summary: CloverETL is open source data integration platform based on Java. It can be used for data migration, data cleansing and other data transformation tasks.
details: CloverETL is open source data integration platform based on Java. It can be used for data migration, data cleansing and other data transformation tasks.

name: DataFire
summary: DataFire allows you to process and transfer data between APIs, databases, and more. DataFire has hundreds of data sources and destinations for you to choose from. DataFire is built on open standards like RSS and Swagger so you can easily add your own integrations. Use JavaScript to transform data from one connection into input for another.
details: DataFire allows you to process and transfer data between APIs, databases, and more. DataFire has hundreds of data sources and destinations for you to choose from. DataFire is built on open standards like RSS and Swagger so you can easily add your own integrations. Use JavaScript to transform data from one connection into input for another.

name: elastic.io
summary: elastic.io helps you to automate routine operations and connect multiple cloud APIs.
details: elastic.io helps you to automate routine operations and connect multiple cloud APIs.

name: Factor.io
summary: Factor.iou0026nbsp;is a service which enables you to connect best-of-breed tools you already use in your development workflow with a simple if-this-then-that interface.
details: Factor.iou0026nbsp;is a service which enables you to connect best-of-breed tools you already use in your development workflow with a simple if-this-then-that interface.

name: Flow XO
summary: Connect your cloud apps together into automated workflows. Workflows run through your existing apps and email, no new tools to learn. Our simple workflow designer is easy, fast and fun - even for novice users.  Use Flow XO for marketing, on-boarding, up-selling and renewals u0026 retention. n
details: Connect your cloud apps together into automated workflows. Workflows run through your existing apps and email, no new tools to learn. Our simple workflow designer is easy, fast and fun - even for novice users.  Use Flow XO for marketing, on-boarding, up-selling and renewals u0026 retention. n

name: itDuzzit
summary: itDuzzit is a cloud integration platform like no other; simple enough for non-technical users, yet powerful enough to support the most complex integration.
details: itDuzzit is a cloud integration platform like no other; simple enough for non-technical users, yet powerful enough to support the most complex integration.

name: Jolicloud
summary: Jolidrive is your personal space in the cloud. Jolidrive unifies all your content from multiple services in one simple and beautiful interface accessible from anywhere. Jolicloud is the most innovative platform to access our life online, from computers to mobile.
details: Jolidrive is your personal space in the cloud. Jolidrive unifies all your content from multiple services in one simple and beautiful interface accessible from anywhere. Jolicloud is the most innovative platform to access our life online, from computers to mobile.

name: Kloudless
summary: Kloudless provides a single API to connect with over 20 different cloud storage services such as Box, Dropbox, Office 365 and more. Developers can save time integrating their apps with cloud storage by using Kloudlesss unified API. Kloudless also adds in new functionality such as event notifications even if the underlying API doesnt provide it, and provides UI tools such as a File Explorer to simp
details: Kloudless provides a single API to connect with over 20 different cloud storage services such as Box, Dropbox, Office 365 and more. Developers can save time integrating their apps with cloud storage by using Kloudlesss unified API. Kloudless also adds in new functionality such as event notifications even if the underlying API doesnt provide it, and provides UI tools such as a File Explorer to simplify integration.

name: MashableLogic
summary: MashableLogic is a mashup development platform that provides a system for leveraging APIs by turning them into re-usable components that can be combined to compose software solutions.
details: MashableLogic is a mashup development platform that provides a system for leveraging APIs by turning them into re-usable components that can be combined to compose software solutions.

name: MuleSoft
summary: A single graphical design environment for Anypoint Platform, Anypointu2122 Studio accelerates developer productivity with an easy on ramp for cloud and on-premises integration and API development.
details: A single graphical design environment for Anypoint Platform, Anypointu2122 Studio accelerates developer productivity with an easy on ramp for cloud and on-premises integration and API development.

name: Otixo
summary: Manage all your clouds from one login with Otixo. Connect services like Dropbox, Box, SkyDrive, Google Docs, SugarSync, Picasa, CX, Amazon S3, FTP sites and WebDav drives...all from one simple app.
details: Manage all your clouds from one login with Otixo. Connect services like Dropbox, Box, SkyDrive, Google Docs, SugarSync, Picasa, CX, Amazon S3, FTP sites and WebDav drives...all from one simple app.

name: Pentaho
summary: Delivers powerful Extraction, Transformation and Loading (ETL) capabilities using an innovative, metadata-driven approach. With an intuitive, graphical, drag and drop design environment, and a proven, scalable, standards-based architecture, Pentaho Data Integration is increasingly the choice for organizations over traditional, proprietary ETL or data integration tools.
details: Delivers powerful Extraction, Transformation and Loading (ETL) capabilities using an innovative, metadata-driven approach. With an intuitive, graphical, drag and drop design environment, and a proven, scalable, standards-based architecture, Pentaho Data Integration is increasingly the choice for organizations over traditional, proprietary ETL or data integration tools.

name: RITC
summary: Easily integrate u0026amp; automate cloud products and services, build apps, and create workflows using the Ritc API, allowing youu0026nbsp;to add functionality to your cloud applications and services.
details: Easily integrate u0026amp; automate cloud products and services, build apps, and create workflows using the Ritc API, allowing youu0026nbsp;to add functionality to your cloud applications and services.

name: Road Rules
summary: Road Rules enables drivers to create rules that automate their lives in the context of the car. Our app works with both connected cars u0026amp; non-connected cars.
details: Road Rules enables drivers to create rules that automate their lives in the context of the car. Our app works with both connected cars u0026amp; non-connected cars.

name: Rules.io
summary: Overwhelmed with too much data and too many metrics? u0026nbsp;The rules.io team drills into your data with you, giving you a concrete idea of which users you should talk to and how to engage them.At the core of rules.io is a rules and segmentation engine which captures user-centric data such as usage and behavior, purchases, and technical problems, and allows you to act on this information in real-ti
details: Overwhelmed with too much data and too many metrics? u0026nbsp;The rules.io team drills into your data with you, giving you a concrete idea of which users you should talk to and how to engage them.At the core of rules.io is a rules and segmentation engine which captures user-centric data such as usage and behavior, purchases, and technical problems, and allows you to act on this information in real-time or via triggered automation.

name: Run Dexter
summary: Solve those annoying problems on the web. In simpler times, BASH scripts made repetitive tasks on your own computer easier to execute. But today, your data is spread across dozens of web services, protected by OAuth, and accessible only through service-specific APIs. Dexter brings the power of local scripting to the web, allowing you to build simple apps that link multiple services, run tasks, and
details: Solve those annoying problems on the web. In simpler times, BASH scripts made repetitive tasks on your own computer easier to execute. But today, your data is spread across dozens of web services, protected by OAuth, and accessible only through service-specific APIs. Dexter brings the power of local scripting to the web, allowing you to build simple apps that link multiple services, run tasks, and get rid of headaches.

name: Scribe
summary: Scribe Software Corporation provides cost-effective, no-coding solutions that can be used as the only tool businesses need to integrate virtually any application, data source or Software as a Service (SaaS) platform.
details: Scribe Software Corporation provides cost-effective, no-coding solutions that can be used as the only tool businesses need to integrate virtually any application, data source or Software as a Service (SaaS) platform.

name: Skyvia
summary: Wizard-based integration with no effort, no coding, and no need for special knowledge, performed completely in a cloud.
details: Wizard-based integration with no effort, no coding, and no need for special knowledge, performed completely in a cloud.

name: SnapLogic
summary: SnapLogics modern web architecture, containerized Snaps, and thriving SnapStore ecosystem make it the only practical way to continually connect your company to the burgeoning number and diversity of data sources and cloud applications.u0026nbsp;
details: SnapLogics modern web architecture, containerized Snaps, and thriving SnapStore ecosystem make it the only practical way to continually connect your company to the burgeoning number and diversity of data sources and cloud applications.u0026nbsp;

name: StackPile
summary: A better way to install 3rd party apps. StackPile allows you to install and use 3rd party tools and apps on your website in seconds without expensive code changes.
details: A better way to install 3rd party apps. StackPile allows you to install and use 3rd party tools and apps on your website in seconds without expensive code changes.

name: Stringify
summary: They are hard at work developing new ways to help you connect your life. This begins with a solution that helps you discover, design and control new experiences by meaningfully connecting those things that matter most. Theyre helping connect our life so you can live it.
details: They are hard at work developing new ways to help you connect your life. This begins with a solution that helps you discover, design and control new experiences by meaningfully connecting those things that matter most. Theyre helping connect our life so you can live it.

name: Systemizer
summary: Systemizer allows you to automate your online workflow by chaining all sorts of web-based events, actions and user interactions together. All of Systemizers functionality is available via an extensive REST API. All you need is an API key (see the Create Account call for details) and an environment with which to make HTTP requests such as Fiddler (Windows) or cURL (Command line, all platforms). Typ
details: Systemizer allows you to automate your online workflow by chaining all sorts of web-based events, actions and user interactions together. All of Systemizers functionality is available via an extensive REST API. All you need is an API key (see the Create Account call for details) and an environment with which to make HTTP requests such as Fiddler (Windows) or cURL (Command line, all platforms). Typically however, youll want to use the Systemizer user interface (unreleased as yet) or your own application code which will make calls to the Systemizer API according to the needs of your application.

name: TaDaweb
summary: The TaDaweb Creator lets you create advanced web recipes. A web recipe can be compared to an automatic process that collects, transforms, and combines information. They are quick and easy to create because they are based on human, rather than computer logic. Recipes can be created by users, with TaDaweb also providing the option to create recipes on demand.
details: The TaDaweb Creator lets you create advanced web recipes. A web recipe can be compared to an automatic process that collects, transforms, and combines information. They are quick and easy to create because they are based on human, rather than computer logic. Recipes can be created by users, with TaDaweb also providing the option to create recipes on demand.

name: Talend
summary: Talend offers open source middleware solutions that address big data integration, data management and application integration needs for businesses of all sizes.
details: Talend offers open source middleware solutions that address big data integration, data management and application integration needs for businesses of all sizes.

name: Temboo
summary: Temboou0026nbsp;has built a Library with 1500+ detail-documented, ready-to-run developer processes called Choreos for 100+ APIs and more. We offer flexible and smart SDKs for first-time to big-time developers (and everyone in between). Build well-crafted, mightier apps in less time.nWe build efficient, smart shortcuts that you can drag and drop right into your code. More than just code snippets, these
details: Temboou0026nbsp;has built a Library with 1500+ detail-documented, ready-to-run developer processes called Choreos for 100+ APIs and more. We offer flexible and smart SDKs for first-time to big-time developers (and everyone in between). Build well-crafted, mightier apps in less time.nWe build efficient, smart shortcuts that you can drag and drop right into your code. More than just code snippets, these ready-to-use processes (so elegant and special that we call them Choreos, like choreography) make API integration easy, taking care of authentication, credential management, updates, and more. Right now, our Library has Choreos for over 100 popular APIs (and counting).

name: tray.io
summary: Tray.io offers a platform that makes it easy for anyone to build and share SaaS integrations. Currently integration solutions are divided into two parts, simple point to point data migration services (easy to setup, very restrictive), and enterprise platforms (resource heavy, expensive and platform specific). Integrations are built on tray.io using the visual workflow editor or any major programmi
details: Tray.io offers a platform that makes it easy for anyone to build and share SaaS integrations. Currently integration solutions are divided into two parts, simple point to point data migration services (easy to setup, very restrictive), and enterprise platforms (resource heavy, expensive and platform specific). Integrations are built on tray.io using the visual workflow editor or any major programming language, thanks to the open community of SaaS connectors, libraries and user interface components.

name: Unifyle
summary: Primadesk brings order to online life, enabling users to search, manage and backup personal data from anywhere, whether it is from a personal computer, tablet or smartphone. Primadesk was founded in 2009 by two entrepreneurs who recognized the growing need for making Internet-based applications and online information unified across applications seamlessly.u0026nbsp;
details: Primadesk brings order to online life, enabling users to search, manage and backup personal data from anywhere, whether it is from a personal computer, tablet or smartphone. Primadesk was founded in 2009 by two entrepreneurs who recognized the growing need for making Internet-based applications and online information unified across applications seamlessly.u0026nbsp;

name: WAPPWOLF
summary: Wappwolf is focused on deconstructing the barriers of the Cloud, by connecting your Evernote, Facebook, Flickr, and other web services / apps to Dropbox, allowing users to drag u0026amp; drop files into a predefined folder on Dropbox and automatically convert and sync to your favorite places.
details: Wappwolf is focused on deconstructing the barriers of the Cloud, by connecting your Evernote, Facebook, Flickr, and other web services / apps to Dropbox, allowing users to drag u0026amp; drop files into a predefined folder on Dropbox and automatically convert and sync to your favorite places.

name: We Wired Web
summary: We-Wired Web enables users to define automated tasks using over 50 popular web services using APIs that execute periodically.
details: We-Wired Web enables users to define automated tasks using over 50 popular web services using APIs that execute periodically.

name: Workato
summary: Workato helps anyone create powerful, business critical integrations between cloud apps in minutes. No IT. No developers required. At Workato we are passionate about creating an enterprise grade, rich and secure service to integrate your apps but with the soul of some of the most beloved consumer services by being simple, fun, self-service, community based and inexpensive. Business users, yes, tho
details: Workato helps anyone create powerful, business critical integrations between cloud apps in minutes. No IT. No developers required. At Workato we are passionate about creating an enterprise grade, rich and secure service to integrate your apps but with the soul of some of the most beloved consumer services by being simple, fun, self-service, community based and inexpensive. Business users, yes, those of you that sign up for or use cloud based applications can now also connect them together using Workato.

name: Zapier
summary: Zapier lets SaaS users create integrations that push data between hundreds of best-in-breed web applications without having to write any code or wrangle APIs.
details: Zapier lets SaaS users create integrations that push data between hundreds of best-in-breed web applications without having to write any code or wrangle APIs.
